payload.name: model-predictive-control-mpc
payload.title: Model predictive control (MPC): stability under constraints/delays
payload.formal: optimize control sequence (u_{t:t+H}) over horizon (H) subject to dynamics (x_{t+1}=f(x_t,u_t)) and constraints.
payload.apm2_mapping: governance and autoscaling are controllers. The “plant” is: queue lengths, token burn, tool pool occupancy, ledger growth. MPC suggests: don’t react to instantaneous spikes; plan with constraints (budgets, risk tiers) and with known delays (CI latency, network partitions). Encode the plant model and constraints in policies, not ad-hoc code.
